title: Is it possible to fix a missing pad to place pin on motherboard LCD
message: I happen to rip off one pad on 30pin imac 27" A1312.. Is there a way to fix it? [h=1][/h]

title: Is it possible to fix a missing pad to place pin on motherboard LCD
message: 99% of the cases you can run a strand of wire to the component the pad used to go to. Depends on which pin got ripped.

title: Is it possible to fix a missing pad to place pin on motherboard LCD
message:
No Title

The two arrows shows the pad which is gone..

title: Is it possible to fix a missing pad to place pin on motherboard LCD
message: Can I just place the new LCD LVDS cable right on top of it and solder? or is it broken.. and need wire?

title: Is it possible to fix a missing pad to place pin on motherboard LCD
message: You can see the via that the trace is running to. Just solder a strand of wire to the via and then to the connector pin.

title: Is it possible to fix a missing pad to place pin on motherboard LCD
message:
No Title

Do you mean lkike this, Blue line.. Check phot.. From pad to this little circle??

title: Is it possible to fix a missing pad to place pin on motherboard LCD
message: Yes, that is the via you need to solder to.

title: Is it possible to fix a missing pad to place pin on motherboard LCD
message: Brilliant.. Million thanks Duke for the support.. Wish u a great week ahead.. regards, Patrick
